oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Nell Barnes, 1982 August 07, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nell Barnes, conducted on 7 August 1982 by Ophelia Paine as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Barnes discusses catching the streetcar to Glendale Park, one of her favorite childhood memories. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barnes, Nell (Nellie Marie Gardner), b. 1909--Interviews
Glendale Park (Nashville, Tenn.)
